items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: LocalChat: A Lightweight Client-Side Chat Interface A responsive browser-based chat application using vanilla JavaScript that simulates real-time messaging without a backend. Features message persistence with localStorage, responsive design, and smooth animations. Perfect for learning front-end fundamentals.
